We accept most major insurance carriers and uninsured persons

We accept most major insurance carriers and uninsured persons

  • Aetna
  • BCBS TRADITIONAL
  • BEUAMONT HEALTH / UMR
  • BCBS TRUST/COMMUNITY BLUE
  • BLUE CARE NETWORK HMO
  • BLUE CARE NETWORK ADVANTAGE
  • CIGNA – HAP
  • COFINITY
  • GREAT LAKES HEALTH PLAN
  • HEALTH ALLIANCE PLAN – HAP
  • HEALTH PLAN OF MICHIGAN
  • HUMANA
  • MEDICARE
  • MEDICAID
  • MOLINA
  • OMNICARE
  • PRIORITY HEALTH
  • TOTAL HEALTH CARE
  • TRICARE STANDARD
  • UNITED HEALTH

    • To check if your insurance is accepted or to find out what tests are included if you’re insured, please, contact your insurance company.

Follow us on social media

Whether you’re insured or uninsured, we keep our fees low to help you receive the medical care you need before it becomes an emergency room issue.We want to be your first choice for urgent care, occupational health, and primary care.
